title: Esscher Transform and the Central Limit Theorem
abstract:
The paper is devoted to the investigation of Esscher's transform on high
dimensional Euclidean spaces in the light of its application to the central
limit theorem. With this tool, we explore necessary and sufficient conditions
of normal approximation for normalized sums of i.i.d. random vectors in terms
of the R\'enyi divergence of infinite order, extending recent one dimensional
results.
